name: Abyss Hunt
description:
Abyss Hunt is an online asymmetric multiplayer survival game where you play as a diver or an abyss monster in the underwater world. The divers must work together to collect treasures scattered around the map whilst being hunted down by the monsters’ hunger for human flesh. The depth itself is your enemy, gear up and descend into the darkest pit where madness awaits. Survive the dangers and return to the base, lest you become fish bait.

This game was made in collaboration with Lycée des arts et métiers du Luxembourg

2D/3D Artist : Victoria SARAT

Lead programmer: Tiago RODRIGUES GOMES

Gameplay designer: Lionel BACKES

Lead Artist: Aurélien MOHR
